price: (11) But never will Allāh delay a soul when its time has come. And Allāh is Aware of what you do.
arabic: وَلَن يُؤَخِّرَ ٱللَّهُ نَفۡسًا إِذَا جَآءَ أَجَلُهَاۚ وَٱللَّهُ خَبِيرُۢ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: walan yu-akhira al-lahu nafsan idhā jāa ajaluhā wal-lahu khabīrun bimā taʿmalūna
